workflow.name: CA Import/Export Using GIT Target - HTTP
workflow.title: CA Import/Export Using GIT Target - HTTP

properties.description:
This workflow performs  this below operations to import workflow to GIT

Create GIT Accrountkey
Craete GIT Target
Import worklfow
Validates Import WorkflowStatus
Execute Workflow
verfiy WF Instance Run status
Export Workflow
verfiy Exported Workflow status (Export success/Failed)
Detach GIT Target from Workflow
Delete GIT Target
Delete Git Key
Delete WF Instance
Delete Workflow
properties.display_name: CA Import/Export Using GIT Target - HTTP

properties.body:
{
  "name": "CA GIT test Import/Export",
  "title": "CA GIT test Import/Export",
  "properties": {
    "no_runtime_user": false,
    "repo_type": "github",
    "branch": "master",
    "display_name": "CA GIT test Import/Export",
    "default_runtime_user_id": "$activity.definition_activity_01I2MJT7DA5NP72tYTRad5Tpkj8FAolYvoF.output.jsonpath_queries.GIT Accountkey ID$",
    "protocol": "https",
    "repo": "api.github.com/repos/ChandraAddan/Test"
  },
  "type": "git.repository",
  "base_type": "target"
}

actions.name: HTTP Request
actions.title: GET WF To verify import Status

properties.display_name: GET WF To verify import Status

actions.name: Group
actions.title: Delete Instance, WF,  GIT Key and Target

properties.display_name: Delete Instance, WF,  GIT Key and Target
